ai-tha-ap227:1.2_0: I’ll be enough to respect the fire,
ai-tha-ap227:2.1_0: Through that deed and through its result
ai-tha-ap227:2.3_0: I’m not aware of such a thing,
ai-tha-ap227:3.2_0: Then the rice-gruel (food) departed from that sal grove.
ai-tha-ap227:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap227:3.4_0: as the water-boiling shed is the fruit.
ai-tha-ap227:4.2_0: alone in the same sleeping place.
ai-tha-ap227:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Abhibhū.
ai-tha-ap227:7.1_0: The fifth Elders were the World in Wisdom
